Uses of Package
be.ac.umons.jsonschematools

  • Packages that use be.ac.umons.jsonschematools 
    Package Description
    be.ac.umons.jsonschematools
    Contains tools to manipulate and abstract a JSON Schema, a generator, and a validator.
    be.ac.umons.jsonschematools.generatorhandlers  
    be.ac.umons.jsonschematools.validatorhandlers  
  • Classes in be.ac.umons.jsonschematools used by be.ac.umons.jsonschematools 
    Class Description
    ComparableJSONObject
    A JSONObject that implements the interface.
    Generator
    A generator for JSON documents, given a JSON schema.
    GeneratorException
    The exception thrown if the generator can not generate a value.
    JSONSchema
    A JSON schema describes constraints JSON documents must satisfy.
    JSONSchemaException
    Exception thrown by a JSON Schema.
    JSONSchemaStore
    Stores the schemas used so far.
    Type
    The different types a value can take.
    Validator
    Decides whether a JSON document satisfies a JSON schema.
  • Classes in be.ac.umons.jsonschematools used by be.ac.umons.jsonschematools.generatorhandlers 
    Class Description
    Generator
    A generator for JSON documents, given a JSON schema.
    GeneratorException
    The exception thrown if the generator can not generate a value.
    JSONSchema
    A JSON schema describes constraints JSON documents must satisfy.
    JSONSchemaException
    Exception thrown by a JSON Schema.
  • Classes in be.ac.umons.jsonschematools used by be.ac.umons.jsonschematools.validatorhandlers 
    Class Description
    JSONSchema
    A JSON schema describes constraints JSON documents must satisfy.
    JSONSchemaException
    Exception thrown by a JSON Schema.
    Validator
    Decides whether a JSON document satisfies a JSON schema.
